about_the_game:
Odds and Ends, Volume 9


With Monster Grin's Odds & Ends token packs, it might sometimes be random, but it's always gonna be awesome! Take these 110 unique, artfully designed and stunning for instance: awesome and detailed figures from across genre and time! If you're looking to add some variation to your game or to your party, be sure and pick up these tokens, which include some stunning characters and creatures from the pen of Alexandra Coggon that would fit in any fantasy, cyberpunk, or grimdark noir game: mystical, blade-swinging firebrands, mysterious monk-like jadeyes, ephemeral sphinxes and much more!

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):

  • Female Gunslinger
  • Female Jadeye
  • Female Sphinx
  • Male Firebrand
  • Male Minotaur

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on September 13, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Odds and Ends, Volume 9


With Monster Grin's Odds & Ends token packs, it might sometimes be random, but it's always gonna be awesome! Take these 110 unique, artfully designed and stunning for instance: awesome and detailed figures from across genre and time! If you're looking to add some variation to your game or to your party, be sure and pick up these tokens, which include some stunning characters and creatures from the pen of Alexandra Coggon that would fit in any fantasy, cyberpunk, or grimdark noir game: mystical, blade-swinging firebrands, mysterious monk-like jadeyes, ephemeral sphinxes and much more!

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on September 13, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
